item.title: How to Import GPX File into Garmin
item.description: This post will give a quick summary on how to import GPX route into Garmin watch.

item.title: Garmin Forerunner 965 Essential Tips and Setups
item.description: In this post, I want to share a list of tips/setups for the Garmin Forerunner 965 watch. Some of the settings are also applicable to other Garmin watches.
